title: Playa Preservation Tips
author: Will Chase
content: Our man Dave X, who manages the Fire Art Safety Team (FAST) and all the awesome pyro stuff you see on playa (yay fireworks) wrote up a great post about taking care of the playa, and what you can do to help â€¦ a lot of stuff you are likely not aware of that makes a big difference. Take it to heart, and your planning process! Dave X says:
